name: Duck Duck Plays the Blues
description:
It's been a long day, and Duck Duck's ready to unwind in the best way they know how: an impromptu jam session! Can you help them get in the groove?

I mean... it's not really your responsibility. I'm sure they'll be fine on their own. Why don't you just take some time to riff off the backing track and enjoy yourself? And hey, if you happened to make some smooth tunes along the way, that's cool too.

Gamepad


Keyboard

Made with PICO-8.
Music track generated with the help of midi2pico.
